text: Let's Dance 2006 was the first season of the Swedish celebrity dancing show Let's Dance, broadcast on TV4. The show was presented by David Hellenius and Agneta Sjödin. Winner of this season was singer Måns Zelmerlöw and 1-runner up was singer Anna Book. ==Couples== *Måns Zelmerlöw and Maria Karlsson *Anna Book and David Watson *Viktor Åkerblom Nilsson and Carin da Silva *Arja Saijonmaa and Tobias Karlsson *Peppe Eng and Malin Watson *Kishti Tomita and Tobias Wallin *Tone Bekkestad and Peter Broström *Paolo Roberto and Helena Fransson *Carolina Gynning and Daniel da Silva *Melker Andersson and Ingrid Beate Thompson ==Scoring chart== {| class="wikitable sortable" align="center" style="text-align:center;" !
